Title: Romain Jerome Red Octopus RJ.T.AU.DI.002.01
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Romain Jerome Red Octopus RJ.T.AU.DI.002.01 (Click to Enlarge) Romain Jerome Red Octopus RJ.T.AU.DI.002.01 Condition: Unworn Brand: Romain Jerome Series: Octopus Retail Price: $14,950.00 Reference: RJ.T.AU.DI.002.01 Also Known As: RJTAUDI00201 Web ID: 24376Stock Number: 2188709-MCase Size: 46 mm Gender: Gents Movement: Automatic Caliber: RJ002-A2 Functions: Hours, Minutes, Seconds Strap: Rubber Clasp Type: Tang Signatures: Romain Jerome Included Items: Manufacture's Box and Papers Power Reserve: 42 Hours Materials: Stainless Steel Case Back: Solid Crown: Screw Down Dial Color: Black Romaine Jerome Titanic DNA Octopus Diver's watch This is the very first diver’s watch conceived by Romain Jerome & it is a rugged & yet elegant watch that will appeal to those who want to take it to the murky depths, as well as those who just want a very cool watch. Limited Edition of 888 pieces for each version.The Octopus name is actually part of the Octo theme which involves the number 8. There are special 8 sided screws in parts of the caseIt is water resistant to 888 feet, and it will be part of a limited edition of 888 pieces.Stabilized Titanic rusted steel bezel. The case is available in steel or PVD coated steel. There is also a version with 18K rose gold accents. Steel case with octagonal screws. One crown at 3 o’clock to set the time control device on the internal rotating bezel, one crown at 9 o’clock to set the time.Mechanical self-winding movement Caliber RJ002-A2 with a 42 hour power reserve. The base dial is unique on each piece as it is individually hand brushed and meant to look a bit worn. There are large blue SuperLuminova hour markers, as well as indicators on the reverse side of the sapphire crystal. The iconic brand hands now with luminescent tips that are easy to see. Case back has a richly engraved octopus that hovers over the RJ logoBlack rubber strap with an interior lining featuring octopus-type suction cups with a steel tang buckle The watch is presented in a diving helmet-style watch box that completes the presentation.The water depth is proudly displayed at 6 o'clock Water resistant to 270 meters / 888 feetPlease note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
